mapper.select: SELECT `t_order`.`currency`, `t_order`.`type`, `t_order`.`seq`, `t_order`.`price`, `t_order`.`qty`, `t_order`.`buy_date`, `t_order`.`order_id`, `t_order`.`result`, `t_order`.`error_code` FROM `coinone`.`t_order` where currency = #{currency} and type = #{type} and seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: insert into t_order (currency, type, seq, price, qty, result) SELECT currency, 'bid' as type, seq, price - seq as price, qty, result FROM (SELECT #{currency} AS `currency`, @RNUM:=@RNUM + 1 AS seq, truncate( (#{price} - (#{price}*0.001)),0) AS `price`, #{qty} AS `qty`, NOW() AS `buy_date`, NULL `order_id`, 'N' `result` FROM (SELECT currency FROM t_ticker ORDER BY timestamp ASC) a, (SELECT @RNUM:=0) b LIMIT #{reqCnt}) t

insert into t_order (currency, type, seq, price, qty, result) SELECT currency, 'ask' as type, seq, price + seq + 1 as price, qty, result FROM (SELECT #{currency} AS `currency`, @RNUM:=@RNUM + 1 AS seq, truncate( (#{price} + (#{price}*0.001)),0) AS `price`, #{qty} AS `qty`, NOW() AS `buy_date`, NULL `order_id`, 'Y' `result` FROM (SELECT currency FROM t_ticker ORDER BY timestamp ASC) a, (SELECT @RNUM:=0) b LIMIT #{reqCnt}) t
mapper.update:

buy_date = #{buyDate},
order_id = #{orderId},
result = #{result},
error_code = #{errorCode},
currency = #{currency} WHERE `currency` = #{currency} AND `type` = #{type} and seq = #{seq}
